attributes.action: Publish how many of these petitions have actually changed government policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would see that most of these petitions are a complete waste of time. In order to prove that they are not, the government should publish statistics on how many of these petitions have actually resulted in a change to government policy

rejection.details: Comments or questions about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
